authorization_request_context:
Hi **%{username}**,
In order to complete your request, **%{name}** needs permission to perform the following actions on your behalf on **%{domain}**:
be careful, those actions might not be r: be careful, those actions might not be reversible
before_accepting_general: Before accepting, you probably want to discuss the following point(s):
before_accepting_lending_advice: Do not lend books you absolutely want to see come back if you're not sure you can trust this person.
book_displayed_unavailable: The book is now displayed as unavailable.
books successfully added to your invento: books successfully added to your inventory
call_to_connect_welcome_message: the infinite inventory of your friends' and communities' books!
can you tell us more about this work and: can you tell us more about this work and this particular edition?
can't find anyone with that name: can't find anyone with that name
confirm_reception: confirm that you received the book
confirm_reception_one_way: [The book](/items/%{itemId}) will be added to your inventory.
confirm_returned: confirm that the book was returned
confirmation_password_reset_email_sent: An email was sent at this address to allow you to reset your password: check your mailbox!
contribution_ideas: Join the [translation team](https://weblate.framasoft.org/projects/inventaire/), open an [issue on our bug tracker](https://github.com/inventaire/inventaire/issues), or simply start a discussion from here or in one of [our communication channels](https://wiki.inventaire.io/wiki/Communication_channels)!
cookies_are_required: cookies are required for the authentification to work: please change your browsers' settings and retry
create and add to your inventory: create and add to your inventory
create and go to the author's page: create and go to the author's page

data_loss_at_merge: labels and claims from properties already defined on the target entity will be lost

delete_entity_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the entity "**%{label}**"?
delete_item_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove **%{title}** from your inventory?
delete_items_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove those **%{amount}** selected books from your inventory?
delete_list_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the list "**%{name}**"?
delete_shelf_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the shelf "**%{name}**"?
destroy_group_confirmation: Are you sure you want to destroy the group **%{groupName}**?
details_placeholder: you might want to give more details on the item or the transaction
discard user's request to join the group: discard user's request to join the group
donate_intro:
inventaire.io is a project aiming to produce useful tools to handle our resources while pushing open knowledge further. In the medium-term, the project's mission should be [supported by an economic activity as described in the Roadmap](https://trello.com/c/Z7alRtpZ).
Until then, you can **support the project development by donating** through one of the following channels:
download your inventory and its associat: download your inventory and its associated data (authors, works, publishers, etc.)
editions can't be moved to Wikidata for: editions can't be moved to Wikidata for the moment
email will not be publicly displayed.
email_confirmation_error: email confirmation request was invalid or expired
email_confirmation_offline_error: login to request a new confirmation email
email_wasnt_verified:
**your email wasn't verified.**
If you can't find the verification email in your mailbox, you can request a new one by clicking the following button:
ex: the secret club of Proustian experts: ex: the secret club of Proustian experts
exchanges_manager_welcome_text:
This is where the books requests you send or receive will be displayed.
To send a book request, go to the book's page and click on "send a request"
existing_entity_items: you already have [%{smart_count} in your inventory](%{pathname})
external_shelves_importer_description: The import file contains the shelves listed below. Selecting the shelves will create new ones in your inventory, unless shelves with the same name already exist. Those shelves will be filled only with the selected books above.
failing_scan_tip: if the scanner has difficulties to find the codebar, it might be that the light isn't adequate or that the camera isn't good enough
fediversable_description:
This option lets you be visible on the fediverse. This way, users of fediverse services (such as Mastodon or Pleroma) will be able to find and follow your account at %{username}@%{host}.
When the box below is checked, everytime you add a book to your inventory, your followers on the fediverse will receive an automatically generated message about that book.
This concerns only publicly visible books.
To prevent sending too many messages, when several books are added at about the same time, only one summary message will be sent.
feedback_intro: A bug to report, a functionality that you absolutely need, or maybe you just want to send love? You can do that here!
friendship_request_notification: someone sent you a friendship request
get_involved: Think you can contribute to make Inventaire better? Get involved!!
global_email_toggle_warning: Disabling all email notifications is discouraged as you might miss important notifications: if possible, use the sections below to fine-tune your settings
group_acceptRequest_notification: your request to join a group as been accepted
group_default_description: see the books members of the group %{groupName} want to give, lend or sell
group_invite_notification: you have been invited to join a group
group_join_request_notification: A group in which you are an admin has received a join request
group_kick_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove **%{username}** of the group?
group_make_admin_confirmation: Are you sure you want to make **%{username}** admin of the group?
group_make_admin_warning: This can't be undone and an admin can't be removed from a group, even by another admin
group_position_context: If your group is associated to a specific place (a university, a coworking, etc.), it can be useful to indicate its position to help other users to find it
group_update_description: **%{username}** changed the description of the group **%{groupName}**
group_update_open_false: **%{username}** updated the membership settings for the group **%{groupName}**: admin validation is now required to join the group
group_update_open_true: **%{username}** updated the membership settings for the group **%{groupName}**: no admin validation is required to join the group
group_update_searchable_false: **%{username}** made the group **%{groupName}** searcheable: the group will now appear in public search results
group_update_searchable_true: **%{username}** made the group **%{groupName}** not searcheable: the group won't appear in public search results
help other users to understand what this: help other users to understand what this group is about

now you just need to check your mailbox and click the link in the email
non_monetary_donations:
The biggest and simplest contribution you can do is to **help us spread the news** about this project: [invite your friends to share their inventory](/network/users/invite), share the project throughout all the Internet, write a blog post or a tutorial about it… be creative!
But there are also [other ways to contribute](https://trello.com/c/VIkw1d8q)
not_imported_books: import was incomplete. The following books have not been imported: %{failedImports}
notifications_description: choose which email notifications you would like to receive
number_of_elements_in_the_list: This list contains %{smart_count} element |||| This list contains %{smart_count} elements
offline_help: the server can't be reached: please retry whatever you where doing once back online
old_browser_message:
Hello, thank you for your interest in Inventaire!
Unfortunately, **your browser seems too old to support this webapp**.
Could you [install a more modern browser](https://www.mozilla.org/firefox)?

position_privacy_context: Giving your position allows people nearby to see and request your public books.
position_privacy_tip: No need to give your exact address, just pick a position near where you live or work, or just where you feel comfortable doing book exchanges.
position_settings_description: you may declare a position to tell others where your books are. Either your network or everybody will see this position, depending of the visibility of each book.

wikidata_edit_intro: You requested to edit **%{label}** data which is part of [Wikidata](https://wikidata.org), the open collaborative database from which inventaire.io takes most of its information on books, authors, series, etc. Helping to improve Wikidata thus also improves Inventaire, but also many other projects using those same data!
wikidata_move_intro: You requested to move **%{label}** data to [Wikidata](https://wikidata.org), the open collaborative database from which inventaire.io takes most of its information on books, authors, series, etc. That's awesome! It means that in addition to helping to improve Inventaire, you would now be contributing to improving Wikidata and the many other projects using its data!
